constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMUCKER:
H.R. 609.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article II, Section 8.
[Page H253]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require Amtrak to convey of certain properties to the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
